preferredFunction.stringvalue: error logging or driver shutdown, Whenever possible, all kernel-mode components should log an error and continue to run, rather than calling KeBugCheck
error logging or driver shutdown, Whenever possible, all kernel-mode components should log an error and continue to run, rather than calling KeBugCheck2
error logging or driver shutdown, Whenever possible, all kernel-mode components should log an error and continue to run, rather than calling KeBugCheckEx

preferredFunction.stringValue: IoReleaseRemoveLock, Reserved for system use; use IoReleaseRemoveLock

preferredFunction.stringvalue: nothing, Drivers should not be dependent on processor features

error.stringvalue: MajorVersion must be 1 or 6
MinorVersion must be 0, 0x5, 0x10, 0x20, or 0x30

preferredFunction.stringvalue: NdisMInitializeScatterGetherDma, Needed for >4Gb real memory and large transfers. See details in NdisMAllocateMapRegisters documentation
ExAllocatePoolWithQuotaTag, No tag interferes with debugging

error.stringvalue: Must succeed pool allocations are forbidden. Allocation failures cause a system crash
Must succeed pool allocations are forbidden. Allocation failures cause a system crash

preferredFunction.stringvalue: ExAllocatePoolWithTag, No tag interferes with debugging

error.stringvalue: Must succeed pool allocations are forbidden. Allocation failures cause a system crash
Must succeed pool allocations are forbidden. Allocation failures cause a system crash
Must succeed pool allocations are forbidden. Allocation failures cause a system crash

preferredFunction.stringvalue: MmGetSystemAddressForMdlSafe, Obsolete on Win2K and up and on Win ME.
MmMapLockedPagesSpecifyCache, Obsolete except on Windows 98. Use MmGetSystemAddressForMdlSafe if this is a call to MmGetSystemAddressForMdl.
IoQueueWorkItem[Ex], Obsolete everywhere for Vista. Obsolete downlevel except for limited use in IFS. See the documentation
driver shutdown, When drivers call NtShutdownSystem directly, the registry can be corrupted if there are other threads writing to it at the time of shutdown. Other unsaved user-mode data is also lost

KeQueryTickCount, GetTickCount overflows roughly every 49 days. Code that does not take that into account can loop indefinitely. KeQueryTickCount operates on 64 bit values and does not have that problem

error.stringvalue: Caution: MmSecureVirtualMemory locks VADs, not pages: memory accesses must still be protected by try-except

preferredFunction.stringvalue: use the USBCAMD_DEVICE_DATA2 structure and CamNewVideoFrameEx callback, Obsolete
USBCAMD_DEVICE_DATA2 structure and CamProcessRawVideoFrameEx callback function instead., Obsolete
USBCAMD_DEVICE_DATA2 structure and CamProcessUSBPacketEx instead., Obsolete
USBCAMD_DEVICE_DATA2 structure and CamStartCaptureEx callback function instead., Obsolete
USBCAMD_DEVICE_DATA2 structure and CamStopCaptureEx callback function instead., Obsolete
IRP_MN_QUERY_INTERFACE and IRP_MN_READ_CONFIG requests, Obsolete except for BusDataType==Cmos
IRP_MN_QUERY_INTERFACE and IRP_MN_WRITE_CONFIG requests, Obsolete except for BusDataType==Cmos
IRP_MN_QUERY_INTERFACE and IRP_MN_WRITE_CONFIG requests, Obsolete except for BusDataType==Cmos
IoVolumeDeviceToDosName, Obsolete on WINXP and above

error.stringvalue: Requires a valid dwReason or lpMessage
Calling 'ZwFreeVirtualMemory' without the MEM_RELEASE flag frees memory but not the address descriptors (VADs). Results in address space leaks
Calling 'NtFreeVirtualMemory' without the MEM_RELEASE flag frees memory but not the address descriptors (VADs). Results in address space leaks
Passing both MEM_RELEASE and MEM_DECOMMIT to VirtualFree is not allowed. This results in the failure of this call
Passing zero as the dwFreeType parameter to VirtualFree is not allowed. This results in the failure of this call
Passing MEM_RELEASE and a non-zero dwSize parameter to VirtualFree is not allowed. This results in the failure of this call
Calling VirtualFree without the MEM_RELEASE flag frees memory but not address descriptors (VADs); results in address space leaks
